Description:
After further review, we are not able to roll this out at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience. A new feature in the Project Manager Agent automates the creation of status report emails for your plans. This capability streamlines project updates by generating concise, accurate, and professional email summaries based on your plan's progress, key milestones, and upcoming tasks. With this feature, you can ensure stakeholders stay informed effortlessly, saving time while maintaining transparency and alignment across your projects.
GA date: January CY2026
Preview date: April CY2025
Title: Planner: Status report emails with Project Manager Agent
